title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Number of visitors in millions has increased over the Year.

Number of visitors in millions is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Number of visitors in millions about 3.49 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Number of visitors in millions about 2.49 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2019.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
